about_the_game:
Multishot is a fast-paced 2D multiplayer shooter platformer game where you have the freedom to fully customize your character and experiment with different cosmetics. As you engage in thrilling battles, not only will you rely on your skills, but you'll also have the opportunity to collect power-ups scattered throughout the maps.


Explore a wide range of maps, each offering unique environments and strategic possibilities. From sprawling arenas to tight corridors, every location presents a fresh challenge and demands adaptability from you and your opponents. Keep an eye out for power-ups that can turn the tide of battle in your favor, granting you temporary boosts, enhanced weapons, or unique abilities.

Climbing the leaderboard is a key aspect of Multishot, and only the most skilled and dedicated players will rise to the top. Showcase your abilities and earn recognition as you outperform your rivals and earn your place among the elite. Will you be able to claim the coveted number one spot?

With intuitive controls and smooth gameplay, Multishot caters to both casual and competitive gamers. Whether you're looking for a quick adrenaline rush or aiming to fine-tune your skills for intense esports competition, this game has you covered.

So, are you up for the challenge? Gather your friends, dive into the vast customization options, and get ready to conquer the leaderboards in this addictive, action-packed multiplayer shooter. Prepare to unleash chaos, dominate your opponents, and leave your mark in the world of Multishot!
detailed_description:
Wishlist now on steam!

Multishot is a fast-paced 2D multiplayer shooter platformer game where you have the freedom to fully customize your character and experiment with different cosmetics. As you engage in thrilling battles, not only will you rely on your skills, but you'll also have the opportunity to collect power-ups scattered throughout the maps.

From sprawling arenas to tight corridors, every location presents a fresh challenge and demands adaptability from you and your opponents. Climbing the leaderboard is a key aspect of Multishot, and only the most skilled and dedicated players will rise to the top. Showcase your abilities and earn recognition as you outperform your rivals and earn your place among the elite. Will you be able to claim the coveted number one spot?

With intuitive controls and smooth gameplay, Multishot caters to both casual and competitive gamers. Whether you're looking for a quick adrenaline rush or aiming to fine-tune your skills for intense esports competition, this game has you covered.

So, are you up for the challenge? Gather your friends, dive into the vast customization options, and get ready to conquer the leaderboards in this addictive, action-packed multiplayer shooter. Prepare to unleash chaos, dominate your opponents, and leave your mark in the world of Multishot!
name: Multishot

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS *: Windows 7 (or newer)
  • Processor: Intel Core i3 and above
  • Memory: 400 MB RAM
  • Graphics: (Works on any device)
  • Storage: 250 MB available space
  • Additional Notes: You should be fine with anything really this game doesn't require that much
pc_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • Storage: 250 MB available space
  • Additional Notes: If you have any kind of dedicated pc GPU you should be fine

short_description: Embrace chaos and conquer the leaderboards in Multishot, the ultimate 2D multiplayer shooter platformer. Customize your character, collect power-ups, and engage in thrilling battles across unique maps. Will you rise to the top and claim the coveted number one spot? Join the action now!
supported_languages:
English*, French, Arabic
*languages with full audio support
